mapper.select: /* 사용자 조회 by ID */ SELECT idx, id, nickname, password, token, reg_date FROM memopad_user WHERE id = #{id}
/* 사용자 조회 by nickname */ SELECT idx, id, nickname, password, token, reg_date FROM memopad_user WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
/* 사용자 조회 by Key */ SELECT idx, id, nickname, token, reg_date FROM memopad_user WHERE token = #{token}
mapper.insert: /* 회원가입 */ INSERT INTO memopad_user ( id, nickname, password, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{nickname}, #{password}, NOW() )
